trans-unit.source: Implements a type converter for <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> objects, which deliberately have no type conversion pathways.
trans-unit.target: 實作的類型轉換子<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>刻意有任何類型的轉換路徑的物件。

trans-unit.source: The type converter enforces and reports that behavior.
trans-unit.target: 類型轉換器會強制執行，並報告該行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>類型不應該使用型別轉換子路徑來轉換值。</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>

trans-unit.source: You should use markup extensions instead.
trans-unit.target: 您應該改為使用標記延伸。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>方法一律會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>方法一律會擲回的例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: The exceptions might possibly report invalid input, but even input that is considered valid will result in <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況可能是可能會報告無效的輸入，但即使是被視為有效的輸入會導致<xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 文字用法

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定之類型的物件是否可以轉換的執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>類型轉換 （應改用標記延伸） 的值不應該使用型別轉換子路徑。</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the CanConvertFrom and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，CanConvertFrom 和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>方法一律會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>方法一律會擲回的例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 這個轉換子就要從中叫用的環境的相關資訊會提供格式內容。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 轉換所評估的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>在所有情況下。

trans-unit.source: sourceType is .
trans-unit.target: sourceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 判斷執行個體是否<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>可以轉換成指定的型別，並使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一律傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey> type should not use a type converter pathway to convert values (should use markup extensions instead).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>類型轉換 （應改用標記延伸） 的值不應該使用型別轉換子路徑。</xref:System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey>

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29> and CanConvertTo methods always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>和 CanConvertTo 方法一律會傳回`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.CanConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Type%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> methods always throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>和<xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29>方法一律會擲回的例外狀況。</xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertTo%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%2CSystem.Type%29> </xref:System.Windows.Markup.ComponentResourceKeyConverter.ConvertFrom%28System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext%2CSystem.Globalization.CultureInfo%2CSystem.Object%29>

trans-unit.target: 轉換所評估的類型。

trans-unit.target: destinationTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"></xref>, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指定的物件轉換成<xref href="System.Windows.ComponentResourceKey"> </xref>，使用指定的內容。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情況下，擲回例外狀況。
